casebody.data:
Robert F. BROZ and Kimberly Broz, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
PLANTE & MORAN, PLLC, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 159002
COA: 340381 Supreme Court of Michigan. February 1, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer is GRANTED.

The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before March 5, 2019.
